%sh

#ls $ZEPPELIN_HOME/notebook

ID=2E3J7UQ4F

curl -o  /tmp/note.json https://raw.githubusercontent.com/garysieling/sagemaker-object-detection-scala/master/docker/notebook/$ID/note.json 

cat /tmp/note.json

#curl -vX POST http://localhost:8080/api/notebook/import -d @/tmp/note.json --header "Content-Type: application/json"
